home.heroSubtitle: Where every detail is designed for your comfort and well-being
home.aboutText1: Located in the heart of the Florida Keys, Isla Bella Beach Resort is a paradisiacal destination that combines luxury, nature, and wellness. Surrounded by turquoise waters and white sandy beaches, the resort offers a unique experience for those seeking to relax and reconnect with the environment.
home.aboutText2: So when it comes to booking the perfect hotel, vacation rental, resort, apartment, guest house, or tree house, we've got you covered.
home.cateringDesc: Enjoy exquisite gourmet dishes in the comfort of your room. Service available 24 hours.
home.spaDesc: Relax with our professional treatments, therapeutic massages, sauna, and jacuzzi in a totally tranquil environment.
home.testimonialText: After a construction project took longer than expected, my husband, my daughter and I needed a place to stay for a few nights. As a Chicago resident, we know a lot about our city, neighborhood and the types of housing options available and absolutely love our vacation at Sona Hotel.
home.gymDesc: State-of-the-art equipment available 24/7. Personal trainers and group classes for all levels.

habitaciones.title: Our Rooms
habitaciones.subtitle: Discover comfort and elegance in every space
habitaciones.verandaDesc: Enjoy stunning ocean views from your spacious private veranda. Elegant room with King size bed and all premium amenities.
habitaciones.modernDesign: Modern design with premium finishes and attention to detail
habitaciones.spaciousRoom: Spacious area with all amenities for your perfect stay

restaurantes.title: Our Restaurants
restaurantes.subtitle: Discover a unique gastronomic experience at our hotel, with offerings that combine flavors from around the world.
restaurantes.chineseDesc: A space full of oriental aromas and flavors, with traditional recipes that combine sweet, salty and spicy in perfect measure.
restaurantes.sweetSour: Sweet and sour chicken and caramelized pork
restaurantes.buffetDesc: A journey around the world in one place: fresh salads, grilled meats, pasta, seafood and tempting desserts. All you want, as many times as you want.
restaurantes.buffetNote: We offer different gastronomic options adapted to all people, including menus for vegans, celiacs and other dietary needs
restaurantes.italianDesc: A cozy corner that combines tradition and flavor: wood-fired pizzas, homemade pasta and selected wines that transport you straight to Italy.
restaurantes.grillDesc: Specialty in grilled meat cuts, accompanied by fresh garnishes and a warm atmosphere. Perfect for enjoying a classic barbecue with style.

sobreNosotros.title: About Us
sobreNosotros.intro: Our hotel combines comfort, elegance and hospitality. Since our opening we have welcomed travelers from all over the world, offering unique experiences in gastronomy, activities and exclusive services.
sobreNosotros.historyText1: Founded in 2010, Isla Bella Beach Resort has been a benchmark in the Florida hotel industry.
sobreNosotros.historyText2: Isla Bella Beach Resort has a private beach area and one of the best locations. It is located in Marathon, Florida, 10 km from Florida Keys Aquarium Encounters, close to Seven Mile Bridge and Captain Hooks Marina Dive Center.
sobreNosotros.historyText3: The property has luxurious rooms and a wide variety of restaurants. It includes all services and guests at Isla Bella Beach Resort can enjoy activities for all ages.
sobreNosotros.historyText4: It offers a unique experience to all our guests. From modern and cozy rooms to stunning views, every detail is designed to make your stay unforgettable.
sobreNosotros.historyText5: Our mission is to provide personalized service, creating memorable moments in a warm and safe environment.
sobreNosotros.closing: At Isla Bella, we strive to make every stay a unique experience, combining comfort, style and attention.

footer.description: Experience luxury and comfort at our hotel. Your perfect destination for an unforgettable vacation.
footer.message2: © 2025 Isla Bella Hotel. All rights reserved.

actividades.title: Our Activities
actividades.subtitle: Discover the unique experiences we offer for all tastes and ages
actividades.intro: At our hotel, each day is an invitation to discover new experiences designed to renew body and mind. Surrounded by an incomparable natural environment, we offer a wide range of activities that combine luxury, wellness, and fun. Whether you are looking for moments by the sea, outdoor adventures, unique culinary experiences, or family-friendly activities, here you will find a great variety of options for all tastes and ages. Our team of professionals takes care of every detail so you can enjoy unforgettable moments during your stay and take home memories that last a lifetime.
actividades.intro1: Every day is an invitation to discover new experiences designed to refresh your body and mind.
actividades.intro2: In an unparalleled natural setting, we offer a wide range of activities that combine luxury, wellness, and fun.
actividades.intro3: Whether you’re looking for moments by the sea, outdoor adventures, unique gastronomic experiences, or family-friendly activities.
actividades.intro4: Here you’ll find a wide variety of options for all tastes and ages.
actividades.intro5: We take care of every detail so you can enjoy unforgettable moments during your stay and take memories with you forever.
actividades.text1e: Variety of classes: functional, spinning, strength training, among others
actividades.text3d: Thermal Water Circuit and Finnish Sauna
